arcade.core.gui

Class GUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.core.gui.GUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class GUI
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    Creates a GUI for selecting setup file and running the simulation.

    When the model is called with arguments, then the main method in ARCADE is called directly and GUI is not shown.

      Custom file filter for XML files.
